item.title: Why most enterprise AI agents never reach production and how Databricks plans to fix it
item.description: Databricks Agent Bricks automates enterprise AI agent optimization and evaluation, eliminating manual processes that block production deployments.

item.title: Outset raises $17M to replace human interviewers with AI agents for enterprise research
item.description: Outset raises $17M Series A to scale its AI-moderated research platform used by Nestl√©, Microsoft, and WeightWatchers that's 8x faster and 81% cheaper...

item.title: Lemony is a plug-and-play device for secure on-premise AI
item.description: Lemony launched a simple-looking device to deliver on-premise artificial intelligence to redefine how organizations deploy generative AI.

item.title: Wandercraft raises $75M for acceleration of AI-powered humanoid robotics and exoskeletons
item.description: Wandercraft, a maker of self-balancing robotic mobility systems, has secured $75 million in funding to accelerate AI-powered robotics.

item.title: Quantum Art integrates Nvidia for its scalable quantum computers
item.description: Quantum Art a developer of full-stack quantum computers, has integrated Nvidia's CUDA-Q hybrid quantum-classical platform into its "qubits."
